Blog.post: urlLink Jul.21.2004/ another birthday party:) urlLink But you can see "miho's 24th birthday party" on the picture. Cuz, my korean age is 24 years old by follow the lunar calendar. My friend made that as "24th birthday" for me. But I like western age, 23!!! :p BTW, I had 4 times parties for this 23rd birthday with different group. everytimes soooooooooooooooo excited and happy! thank you, all my friends~ (But they can not know and see this my saying for thanks. cuz, olny my 4 foreigner friends know this blog. i don't wanna this blog shown many people~)

Sometimes... i miss my school. My school name is Ewha Woman's University. - not women, woman's is correct name. cuz as a single seed bears fruit many times its number, Ewha, which began as a missionary school held in a private home, is now the world's largest women's university with 140,000 graduates, 21,000 students, 14 colleges, 1division, and 14 graduate schools. so woman's means that ewha started only one girl. indeed Ewha regards each students as olny one. This name-Ewha given from the Chson Dynasty's last Queen about 120 years ago. Anyway my school is sooooo unique. very conservative and strict for school spirit. first, we can not get married before graduate school. if a student get married during school, she must be expelled from school. originally Ewha was school for the royal and noble ladies. this is a reason Ewha has rigid regulation. (but that regulation called off by Korean Officail Feminin NGO.2 years ago. but still now there are so many non-sense and out of date rule in Ewha.) So almost Korean First Ladies were graduated Ewha. (oh! two ex-first ladies could not graduated Ewha. cuz though they went to the Ewha, but they got married before graduate :) Actually i graduated only girl's school. junior girl's private middle school(3 years) -> private girl's high school(3 years) -> women univ.(4 years) WoW... it takes 10 years in only girls~~~ it's crazy! but my father wanted that.and pushed me for that >. because Korean olders think woman have to be noble bearing and high-minded even still now. they are regarding... "private middle and high school for only girls "are first step for that. and second step is "Ewha." and then the girl must "meet good man." (*that means he has high-class background.) But... !! (sorry... my father.) I don't need to that, just first i regards myself. because the Good Man is real man who must consider my dream and vision as important as his dream and vision. i hope to grown-up together. of course, i must support him for his deam,too. Though i passed only girl's school for ennoble and courtier by parent, i try to see another world. and i will has the power to charm as not olny feminin, but HUMAN! to my unknown lover and everybody:)

happy birth....day..... mi~~ho happy birthday mi~ho~~~~~~~ happy birth.................day..............mi~~~~~~~~~ ho~~~~~~~~~~~~ hap....py birth.........day~~ dear~~~~~ miho~~~~~~~~~~ enjoy your greatest 23rd year to come!
urlLink always be happy as like the birthday :) urlLink
urlLink my soul mates! (but myung-en could not have time with our for seminar) urlLink
urlLink rain urlLink It is raining. So it is going to rain in my eyes.

urlLink t.e.r.r.i.b.l.e urlLink never ending!! nowdays i am working for version-up of toolbar and messenger by myself. so i can appeal to nobody for one's sympathy. ======================================= i think every Y! staff looks so busy.everybody says "i am sooooooooo~~~ busy" phbbbt!! i don't like it. i hoped to get Y!'s FUN(fun is one of Y!'s values)! i don't wanna be cry on another's shoulder. but... now i feel so tired. and i look like just as another Y! staff. no~ no~~ that is not mine!

urlLink what do u want? urlLink can u see the green leaf? another things are grey! yes. u need to see only one =p ======================== i'm 22 years old. so young!!! i know. i know well. but i think this age so important on one's life sequence. at this age, first he or she can concentrate only one!! (of course, that one may love or work or art or sport... anything okay!!) that means this age don't need afraid for start or do something. well, look at me. actually i have so manything i want to do and get. first, i wanna go out of home. (that means i wanna be out of favor in the eyes of the my father.) and i wanna to fall in love with someone. and... but, i am a coward. sometimes so many people said, "miho looks like western girl. so outgoing style and very straigt type." exactly!! ummm but as my soul mates know well, i am afraid i am contrary to my family's expectations and deviate from the custom. so terrible! indeed really terrible thing is... i am afraid i am hurted by something or someone. coward miho! i think i am a young person who behaves like an old person zzz don't forget ur age! ur pretty age!! miho can be forgived anything. cuz u r 22 years old! pls, afriad nothing :) okay. let's concentrate only one i love. don't care another thing!

urlLink snap urlLink Han-river. photo by seung-hee. every morning i see this scene in a train. but i could not remember that exactly. cuz all the time, i slept when i took a train for go to office. today morning~ i slept, too. and so i was passed Samsung station (for my office). zzzz i waked up when i passed 8 stops after Samsung station. finally i was late for go to office. stupid miho. oh my god~~ i really hate me at that time!! actually i do my work carelessly, so usually i make mistake and mis-type for making report. miho!!! plz wake up! wake up! i want screwing up. let's collect my mind!!!!!!!!!!!.

Today martin told me this for long time... martin111my : I think you really can find a good man now accompany you as ur boyfriend martin111my : you are such a nice girl and everyone like you........ martin111my : it is what David told me last time martin111my : I am sorry for asking it if u really mind......... miho!: no worries~ miho!: i don't mind that.. miho!: keep going on~ and then? martin111my : and then?????? martin111my : what do u mean by that? miho!: do u mean why i have no boyfriends now? martin111my : you can say that in this way miho!: first of all. i am a just common girl. and not a attractive to everybody miho!: and another important thing is that... i don't know who i love in here, yep miho!: that's all. i think that is can not controlled by me. miho!: just i think luck! martin111my : no doubt you can say that in this way........you think you are just a common girl over there............however from other people's view, you are actually attractive to them.......quite special.......this is ur good point or advantage martin111my : secondly, in order to find ur true love, sometimes you have to work out by yourself.......I think you know what is feeling of love for sure......... martin111my : thirdly, it is wrong to say that you can not control it at all martin111my : you will regret if you can not catch and take it when a chance is coming martin111my : you must do all the things urself and luck is all the times around you.......... miho!: u r right.. stupid martin!!! so what? so what should i do for that????

Actually i have two website and one blog in Y!K, and a activity minihomi(korean web blog service name). But i made this one. cuz i wanna only my place. sometimes i can write about someone i hate and someone i like... :) And i don't need to care grammar and any mis-typing. Nobody talk my mistake on here. cuz here is own my place. so exciting!!! Actually i don't used talk to another about real me. it's so strange to me. But bUt buT right now i can it easily. feel so good.
